analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders an SVG ‘add to shopping cart’ icon with configurable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable icon component for the UI, symbolizing adding an item to the shopping cart.

Components.name: IconShopcartAdd
Components.responsibility: Renders an <svg> element with a shopping-cart graphic and a plus sign, binding fill color and CSS classes via props/attrs.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declare and type the component props.

fill.description: CSS color value used as the SVG fill.

analysis.Notes:
- No <style> section: styling is controlled via passed-in CSS classes and CSS variables.
- Uses $attrs.class to forward any class attribute onto the <path> element.
- Fully declarative SVG, no runtime logic beyond prop binding.
